title: Drawing, "View from a Hill Top Looking at Bushes and the Sky"
medium: Graphite on letter paper, with bluish impression of an esctucheon
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at various locations:  brownish / rich green; and at bottom right: 2 Brilliant orange / green / 3 greeney / 4 yellowish blue / 5 splendid deep blue.
description: View from a hill top looking at bushes and the sky;a part of a structure is shown in right foreground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "View from a Hill Top Looking at Bushes and the Sky".
Graphite on letter paper, with bluish impression of an esctucheon. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-40-b.
